See Also:
Constant Field Values

sheet

EuclideSheet sheet

zoom

private double zoom
Zoom level (same for x and y). zoom=1 means same scale, zoom<1 is zoom out, and zoom in is >1. Zoom equal to 0 means that zoom and position will be defined next time the paint method will be called.

transform

private java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform
user to dispaly transform

yToTop

private boolean yToTop
Direction of the y axis: up or bottom of the page. Up: necesary for geometric Down: 'text', 'image'

Convert display coordinates (in pixels) in user coordinate (mm), and eventually toggle grid and/or item snap.

Parameters:
x - : x position
y - : y position
toggleGridSnap - : toggle the snap mode of the view to the grid
toggleGridSnap - : toggle the snap mode of the view to the items
